description: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications.
job_applicability: Extremely High. Foundational role in the modern digital economy.
future_trends: Growth in AI/ML engineering, cloud computing, and specialized security roles.
automation_risk: Low. Core tasks involve creativity, design, and abstract thinking.

description: Diagnoses and treats illnesses, providing patient care.
job_applicability: Very High. A critical and respected profession in every society.
future_trends: Rise of AI-assisted diagnosis, telemedicine, and genomic medicine.
automation_risk: Very Low. The human element of care, empathy, and complex decision-making is irreplaceable.

description: Advises and represents clients in legal matters.
job_applicability: Stable. Demand persists in corporate, criminal, and public law.
future_trends: AI is changing legal research, but specialization in new tech law (e.g., AI ethics) is a key trend.
automation_risk: Medium. AI can automate document drafting and review, but client advisory and litigation require human expertise.

description: Oversees operations and makes strategic decisions to achieve business goals.
job_applicability: High. Essential for organizations of all sizes.
future_trends: Emphasis on data-driven decision-making, remote team management, and sustainability.
automation_risk: Medium. Analytics can be automated, but leadership, negotiation, and strategic vision are human-centric.

description: Installs, maintains, and repairs electrical systems.
job_applicability: Very High. A skilled trade with a shortage of qualified professionals.
future_trends: Growth in renewable energy (solar, wind) and smart home installations.
automation_risk: Low. Involves physical, on-site work that is difficult to automate.
